name: Errata
description: A semantic search engine that visualises the search term spatially and ranks the relevant data sources according to similarities in the 'semantic structure' of the search results.

team.name: Sanni Saarijaervi
team.bioHtml: Worked at Errata. University College London

team.title: Head of Business Development
team.name: Louis Lebegue
team.bioHtml: International Development Graduate with tech sales experience. Looking for new opportunities in the emerging Agrotech industry.

jobs.title: Head of Research and Development (Co-Founder)
jobs.description:
We are looking for a mathematically minded co-founder to complement our core team. You would be the master mind behind product development, and in charge of the company’s core product, a semantic algorithm, was well as integrally involved in visioning and designing various applications of the algorithm - especially the mathematical and/or visual aspect thereof. We are looking for a motivated, curious, and a little bit adventurous individual to join our ranks on the semantic front. In return we offer you a challenging and creative medium to express yourself.

Job involves:
- Algorithmic design
- Database design
- Visual design
- If competent, applying statistical and machine learning methods, and training our algorithms on the data produced for and collected by our software

Requirements:
- Mathematical/technical educational background
- Logical mind, holistic outlook
- Problem-solving mindset
- Motivation and initiative
- Some programming experience (any language) preferred
- Experience with / willingness to learn statistics and machine learning preferred
- Multilingual must, an interest in natural languages a plus

The company is currently incorporated in the UK and Hong Kong.
